MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL54 postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Upper Llanandwrog surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:40AM on 17th March 2021
